books.title: Dorothy and the Wizard in Oz
books.author: L. Frank Baum
books.summary: A young girl and her companions travel through dangerous underground realms with the help of an old friend.

books.title: The Maracot Deep
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.summary: A scientific expedition stumbles upon the remnants of Atlantis.

books.title: Passages from the Life of a Philosopher
books.author: Charles Babbage
books.summary: The eminent Victorian scientist and mathematician on his inventions, dreams and adventures.

books.title: A General History of the Pirates
books.author: Captain Charles Johnson
books.summary: The lives and stories of the daring pirate outlaws who terrorized the Atlantic Ocean and Caribbean Sea in the 18th century.

books.title: Green Forest Stories
books.author: Thornton W. Burgess
books.summary: A collection of four animal tales featuring the denizens of the Green Forest.

books.title: The Surprising Adventures of Baron Munchausen
books.author: Rudolph Erich Raspe
books.summary: The legendary Baron Munchausen’s tall tales of wonder and adventure.

books.title: The Tempest
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A magic-induced tempest shipwrecks the king of Naples and his crew on an island inhabited by the usurped duke of Milan.

books.title: Through the Looking-Glass
books.author: Lewis Carroll
books.summary: In a follow-up to her adventures in Wonderland, Alice finds herself in a mirror image of the whimsical land where she becomes a queen in her own right.

books.title: Kate Plus 10
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: A police inspector investigates an enigmatic young woman and her connection with various criminal activities.

books.title: The Case of Charles Dexter Ward
books.author: H. P. Lovecraft
books.summary: A young scholar delves into his family past and finds more than he bargained for.

books.title: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
books.author: Mahatma Gandhi
books.summary: Gandhi relates his life experiences from his birth in Gujarat in 1869 through the Indian National Congress of 1915.

books.title: The Room in the Dragon Volant
books.author: J. Sheridan Le Fanu
books.summary: After an Englishman traveling in France meets a mysterious woman, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous intrigue.

books.title: Twelve Years a Slave
books.author: Solomon Northup
books.summary: The account of a free black man kidnapped in 1841 and sold into slavery, from which it took twelve years to free himself.

books.title: The American Crisis
books.author: Thomas Paine
books.summary: A collection of articles written during the American Revolutionary War that outline Paine’s support for a self-governing America.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Matthew Arnold
books.summary: A collection of occasional and dramatic poems by a Victorian poet, educator, and critic.

books.title: Sunshine Sketches of a Little Town
books.author: Stephen Leacock
books.summary: A humorous account of life in the fictional small town of Mariposa.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Charles Beaumont
books.summary: A collection of short fiction by Charles Beaumont.

books.title: Irish Fairy Tales
books.author: James Stephens
books.summary: Ten stories from the Fenian cycle of Irish folklore retold by James Stephens.

books.title: The Path to Rome
books.author: Hilaire Belloc
books.summary: Hilaire Belloc takes a walking pilgrimage to Rome from his hometown in France, writing of the journey, sketching the sights, and digressing on a wide variety of subjects.

books.title: Scrambles Amongst the Alps in the Years 1860–69
books.author: Edward Whymper
books.summary: A classic in early mountaineering literature, describing the first ascent of the Matterhorn and other climbs in the Alps.
